name: What games does your dad play - 你老豆玩乜GAME
name_original: What games does your dad play - 你老豆玩乜GAME
description:
What games does your dad play - It is a management game with the theme of running a game center, and players can replay a variety of stalls, electronic games, etc. from the 80s, 90s, and even 2000s.

Operating a Game Center:
Each game also requires a certain amount of funds and specific game tickets to build, and some also require employees to operate, so some need to increase manpower appropriately. In addition, all games also need maintenance and the center needs to be cleaned otherwise there will be fewer customers. You can also hire receptionists to increase the number of customers.

Mini-games:
In addition, every game in the game can also be played. Players only need to go to the game and press "E" to enter the mini-game.


Three more games were added to the first release:
1. Alien race - A shooting game where players avoid bullets while shooting alien creatures.
2. City ​​defense tower - A city defense game where players use two turrets to shoot down missiles all over the sky to defend the city.
3. Happy Block - An intellectual game where players need to put the scattered numbers in order.
